casebody.data:
G. B. KENT & SONS, Ltd., Plaintiff-Appellant, v. P. LORILLARD COMPANY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 200, Docket 22922. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued March 2, 1954. Decided March 24, 1954. Lewis & Mound, New York City, Milton N. Mound, Richard Wincor, and Herbert F. Sehmelzer, New York City, of counsel, for plaintiff-appellant. Campbell, Brumbaugh, Free & Graves, New York City, Walter H. Free, Thomas L. Perkins, Robert McCormack and James N. Buckner, New York City, of counsel, for defendant-appellee.

Before CHASE, Chief Judge, and FRANK and HINCKS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed on the opinion below. G. B. Kent & Sons v. P. Lorillard Co., D.C., 114 F.Supp. 621.
